From the brand

The Technology That Cares

PETKIT is a high-tech company founded in 2013,committed to developing an all-in-one solution through the product line consisting of “eat,drink,clean,sleep,and fun” to encourage an intelligent life with your fur pal.

PETKIT proudly creates elegant,sustainable,and cost-effective products that won Red Dot Design Award,iF Design Award,and a number of patents,which have provided to over 30 countries all over the world.

PURA MAX AUTOMATIC CAT LITTER BOX

PURA X AUTOMATIC CAT LITTER BOX

AUTOMATIC PET FEEDERS

PET WATER FOUNTAINS

PET BACKPACK CARRIERS

ACCESSORIES

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 6.3 x 6.3 x 6.22 inches; 1.48 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 15, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ PETKIT
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B083DM9XN9

Ultra-quiet pump(below 30dB),low energy consumption,gives you and your pets 100% sweet sleep
Smart LED Indicator Light remind you the fountain working status.SMART and NORMAL mode are available
Triple Filtration System provides healthy, fresh and oxygen-enriched water for your pets
Note:Powered with USB cable (5V adapter not included) and Pump is replaceable










Intuitive to monitor

The built-in led light reminds you of the fountain’s working status, such as water shortage and filter replacement.

Auto shut-off for protection

The pump will automatically shut off when the water storage level is too low.

Easy to clean

The pump is detachable, replaceable, and very easy to clean.

Price: $159.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:35:57 UTC – Details)

Product Description

【Seasons Apply】This car seat cover can be suitable for every season. The outside of the material is faux leather which can be used all year round. So there is no need to buy one in summer and buy another one in winter.
【Compatibility】 It is universal fit for most of cars, SUVs and trucks. Meanwhile it has a wonderful envelopment with the car seats which can maximize the protection to the seats. We leak out the air bags, so once an accident occurs, the air bags still work.
【Clean and Durability】 This car seat cover is quite easy to clean up when your kids or pets smudge it. It is waterproof so you can use the wet towel directly on it. And when it comes to the routine care, you can treat it the same way to your leather bag. The faux leather we used is not easy to be damaged or broken by your keys, pet’s paws or some other sharp metal. And it is also not easy to be burned up as we use a kind of material which contains fire retardant inside the seat cover.
【Installation】 The installation of this seat cover is not complex. You can install it by yourself through the installation video step by step and can also read the installation instruction inside the package. Don’t forget to communicate with us by emails if you are still frustrated with the installation and we will try our best to help you.
【Post-sale service】 It has 30 days return-protection guarantee and the delivery is through the FBA. We have a problem solving team stand by and if you have any questions you can find us by emails quickly and we will try our best to help you. So just have a try and we are sure you will be satisfied with our products.


Read more







4

(as of Nov 30,2022 10:35:57 UTC – Details)

Price: $17.99 - $16.89
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:55:58 UTC – Details)

Product Description

CUMKA Professional Led Desk Lamp Designed for Your Bright and Clear Life

CUMKA led desk light with usb charging port equipped 52 PCS eye protection LED, there is no flicker and no shadow, soft light that protects your eyes.
Professional office desk lamp with quality head and arm, non-slip bottom make CUMKA desk lamp sturdy and modern.
Long desk lamp head, cast a broader span of light .With the premium heat sink, which makes the usb desk lamp have better heat dissipation function and extend the lifespan of the desk lamp. Stable led desk light, non-flickering light, no harsh glare.
Memory function of desk Lamp would store the mode used last time, no need to readjust it when you turn it on next time.
LED desk lamp can be given to anyone you love and care as a gift on any occasion and festival, such as birthday and various festivals.

Warm and Soft Light Led Desk Lamp, No Flicker Touch Control Desk Lights with Smart Memory Function

*Desk Lamp Specifications

Max Power Voltage: 100V-240V, 50/60Hz

Power Output: 7W

Lumens: 650 LM

5 Color Temperatures: 3000-6000k

*Packing List

1 x Desk Lamp

1 x USB Power Cable

1 x User Manual

*One more USB charging port LED desk lamp help to charge another device when working, studying, reading.

*LED desk lamp with 5 color temperatures and 10 brightness levels to choose from warm light to cool white (3000K-6000K).

*Table lamp desk light with 30/60 mins of automatic timing setting, energy-saving and auto turn off when the time is up.

*Smooth surface with slide and touch control is easy to turn on/off, adjust color mode or brightness, set timing off.

*CUMKA LED Desk lamp with 50000 hours long lifespan ensure long time useage without changing the LED.

*Adjustable & Foldable desk lamps easy to tilt the head up 225°, arm down 90° and base swivels 160 ° to provide the best lighting angle. Easy fold flat to carry and space saving.

Wide Application Desk Lamps for Home Office School for Reading Studying Working

Various Lighting Modes & Eye-Friendly LEDCUMKA table lamp has 5 color temperatures (from 3000K to 6000K), each with 10 brightness levels,which equals 50 modes, just easily and quickly via sensitive touch sensor switch to adjust. This led lamp is perfect for work,reading and study. Desk lamp with usb charging port has energy-saving full-spectrum LED beads with soft eye protection features to relieve eye fatigue,no flicker,no shadow characteristics,meeting your needs in different environments.
Auto Timer Setting & Memory FunctionCUMKA small desk lamp has 30/60 minutes automatic light off timer, even when you fall asleep under the reading lamp while reading at night, the set time will automatically turn off the light when it’s up, saving power. The led desk lamp also has a memory function that allows you to memorize the color and brightness of the light and adjust it freely, making it easy to store your personal settings for the next use.
Multi-Angle Adjustments & Space SavingThe head of the office desk lamp can be rotated 225°, the arm can be folded 90°, the swivel base can be rotated 160° ，making the lighting more flexible, so it can be adjusted to any lighting angle you need at a large angle. The base of the led desk lamps measure 7×4.3 inches, this office lighting takes up little space on the table, but it can light up a large area. The desk lights are perfect for use in living room, reading room, bedroom, office, etc.
Long Lifespan & After-Sales ServiceCUMKA wireless charging lamp have a lifespan of 50000 hours, never need replace a bulb,40 times longer than a typical incandescent light, reducing energy consumption and saving power, we also provide a power cable for faster and more stable charging. We offer a 12-month warranty, if you have any questions about the desk lamps, please contact us anytime.

CUMKA Professional Led Desk Lamp Designed for Your Bright and Clear Life


  • CUMKA led desk light with usb charging port equipped 52 PCS eye protection LED, there is no flicker and no shadow, soft light that protects your eyes.
  • Professional office desk lamp with quality head and arm, non-slip bottom make CUMKA desk lamp sturdy and modern.
  • Long desk lamp head, cast a broader span of light .With the premium heat sink, which makes the usb desk lamp have better heat dissipation function and extend the lifespan of the desk lamp. Stable led desk light, non-flickering light, no harsh glare.
  • Memory function of desk Lamp would store the mode used last time, no need to readjust it when you turn it on next time.
  • LED desk lamp can be given to anyone you love and care as a gift on any occasion and festival, such as birthday and various festivals.


Warm and Soft Light Led Desk Lamp, No Flicker Touch Control Desk Lights with Smart Memory Function

*Desk Lamp Specifications

Max Power Voltage: 100V-240V, 50/60Hz

Power Output: 7W

Lumens: 650 LM

5 Color Temperatures: 3000-6000k

*Packing List

1 x Desk Lamp

1 x USB Power Cable

1 x User Manual




*One more USB charging port LED desk lamp help to charge another device when working, studying, reading.

*LED desk lamp with 5 color temperatures and 10 brightness levels to choose from warm light to cool white (3000K-6000K).

*Table lamp desk light with 30/60 mins of automatic timing setting, energy-saving and auto turn off when the time is up.

Read more




*Smooth surface with slide and touch control is easy to turn on/off, adjust color mode or brightness, set timing off.

*CUMKA LED Desk lamp with 50000 hours long lifespan ensure long time useage without changing the LED.

*Adjustable & Foldable desk lamps easy to tilt the head up 225°, arm down 90° and base swivels 160 ° to provide the best lighting angle. Easy fold flat to carry and space saving.

Read more

item.title: YaNovate Bird Bath Heater for Outdoors in Winter, 2022 Birdbath Deicer 70 Watts Pond De-icer Full-Covered Aluminum Water Heated Thermostatically Controlled with Auto Shut Off Function for Patio Yard
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 【2022 70W Thermostatically Controlled Birdbath Water Heated】AC 120V 70W the outdoor bird bath de-icer thermostatically controlled to operate when necessarily, will automatically turn off at 118 °F and restart work at 68 °F. Heated bird bath prevents water from freezing due to 0-degree F or colder weather. Attract more birds ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $39.99 - $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:51:55 UTC – Details)



【2022 70W Thermostatically Controlled Birdbath Water Heated】AC 120V 70W the outdoor bird bath de-icer thermostatically controlled to operate when necessarily, will automatically turn off at 118 °F and restart work at 68 °F. Heated bird bath prevents water from freezing due to 0-degree F or colder weather. Attract more birds to your yard in winter！
【Heavy Duty Material & Automatic Start-stop Design】Bird bath heater aluminum base surface and full coverage aluminum liners, with highly heat conductive and durable for maximum usage to prevent rust. Built-in an additional thermostat sensor which working continuously in the circuit. When the heating base temperature exceeds 118°F (48°C) will Automatic Disconnect and the temperature drops to 68°F (20°C), the heating will automatically start to ensure safety. Provide better care for your birds.
【Waterproof Design & Safe for Bird】Built-in full-coverage partition layer and high-density aluminum shell double protection can better protect the heating wire, heavy-duty Pond De-icer can waterproof and rust to ensure the safety of birds. Built-in heating cord allows birds and squirrels won’t get hurt if they peck at the electric cord keeps curious birds safe. Allows birds to play in warm water in winter.
【Plug and Play】The birdbath heater has no spare parts to replace, simply plug into a power source and your birds or farm animals will enjoy the gentle warmth water within minutes; In order to prolong the service life of the product, please make sure the heated chicken water Deicer is full cover by water.
【Widely Application】This bird bath heaters can provide fresh flowing warm water for birds and small animals outdoors in winter. Attract more birds to your yard to drink and bathe, It will make you happy to look out during a beautiful snow storm and see a bird getting a drink or a moment of rest from the weather.

4.5
Price: $39.99 - $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:51:55 UTC – Details)

Waterproof & Moisture: Soft PVC envelope enclosure with waterproof, clean pad with damp cloth, soft removable cover is machine washable.Do not immerse in water.
Fireproof and flame retardant pet heating pad: this product has been tested and it have the highest grade V-0 flame retardant capability.as tested in the video: burning directly with a lighter for 20 seconds will not burn.
Safety design: 59Inches/150cm Power Cord With 59Inches/150cm Chew Resistant Casing to keep safeguard you pet safe and extend the service your heating pad life.
Best suitable for dogs and cats- Help the pet (dogs, cats, rabbit, etc.) to keep healthy and comfortably in the winter. Also best for senior pets, arthritic pets, newborn pets, pregnant pets or animals recovering from illness or injury.

【 EASY OPERATION】Universal socket with strong magnetic Screwdriver, and Bendable Extension Cable for corner to drive screw with screwdriver replaceable head, with those tools, your work will be easier, Ideal for women and DIY.
【 UNIVERSAL SOCKET 】Unique design of this universal socket can automatically adjust to any size or shape, suitable for standard 1/4 to 3/4 inches and metric 7mm to 19mm screws, nuts, and blots, meeting all your needs. Compact and portable to anywhere you want.
【 SCREWDRIVER 20PCS/SET】Different screw hat, you need different driver.
【 STRONG MAGNETIC SCREWDRIVER】 Strong magnetic can keep the screws from dropping, and fixed the position of screw, in case of over drilling.
【 BENDABLE EXTENSION CABLE】 This cable can be bent, twisted and rotated at many different angles. It can be drilled into a small space, in a variety of gaps, rather than your hand, flexible installation work. Let this flexible drill bit extension tool help you solve more problems quickly.

Item Weight 0.55 Pounds

Control Method Touch

Item model number Erie

34,057 ratings

4.4 out of 5 stars

Best Sellers Rank #171 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen)
#5 in Humidifiers
Date First Available September 21, 2020

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $27.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:16:33 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Humidifiers 250ML & 2L

Humidifiers 4L & 6L

Tank Cleaners & Heating Pads

Heating Pads & Massagers

Heating Wrap & Spin Scrubbers

THE PERFECT BALANCE BETWEEN POWER AND PORTABILITY: The lightweight compact, slim design makes it the perfect choice for any environment. A great humidifier for bedroom, office, baby room, or car, just turn it on, and enjoy better, healthier air
BOOST COMFORT LEVELS INSTANTLY: The ultrasonic cool mist humidifier comes with two mist modes – continuous & intermittent – able to change the environmental humidity in minutes. An intuitive one-button control, without needless and complicated settings, and an auto shut-off feature for your safety and calmness
INSTANT DRYNESS FIXER: YOUR LUNGS WILL THANK YOU! Our brand new humidifier for bedroom or office incorporates an elegant, compact design, making it super-portable and easy to use. Erie desk humidifier will fine-tune the humidity levels of your surroundings, allowing you to breathe a healthier air, and make your environment a lot more pleasant
SLEEP TIGHT: While you are sound asleep, our humidifiers for bedrooms moisturize the room at the 38dB noise level. The unit is as quiet as a ticking clock
SILENT STEALTHY FUNCTION FOR DREAMY NIGHTS: Great for sleeping, it also doubles as a night-light! Soft on your eyes, this nifty little feature makes it the ideal humidifier to use at night or as a baby humidifier for nursery, offering a relaxed, quiet environment for a sound and healthy sleep.
1-YEAR WARRANTY: RISK-FREE PURCHASE & HASSLE-FREE REPLACEMENT. Please don’t hesitate to reach out. We would be more than willing to assist! Just a little tip: to increase the life of the humidifier, we recommend using GENIANI Cotton Sticks.

Geniani Erie Humidifier

Introducing the newest innovation of air humidifiers for home or office!

The Erie Humidifier is a compact, yet powerful instant dryness fixer. Now you can have the capabilities of a room humidifier in a fabulous portable version. The mini humidifier also helps with the relief of allergy symptoms and dry cough.

Key features:

  • Sleek design & smart features
  • Portable, yet powerful
  • Offers up to 8 hours runtime
  • Silent action & night-light feature
  • Cost-effective compared to larger versions

Maintenance couldn’t be simpler!

Just a little effort to refill

The Erie personal humidifier can be refilled in seconds. Gently, with a single movement, unscrew the humidifier clockwise to fill it with water.

All-day or All-night Performance

You won’t have to worry about frequent refills since its 0.06 gal (250 ml) capacity is enough to last an entire office day, or night’s sleep.

Convenience at its best

This silent humidifier is such a great addition to an office, quietly working its magic for better air. It’s powered by most USB ports or sockets. Please note. The humidifier is not equipped with a battery; it is powered by a USB cord only.

One-button Control

Simple and intuitive one-button control to switch between operating modes. No hassle, just simple for optimal convenience.

Read more

Dry air is a definite plant killer. Just like your lungs need fresher air, so do most plants need a certain level of humidity to thrive. This small humidifier for plants will keep the air at optimum humidity level, so your lovely plants will have all the moisture they need to flourish.

At home – Perfect. At the office – Perfect. In the car – Perfect

Moisturize your skin

Moisturizing helps your skin stay young and reduces the chances of skin problems.

Safe for babies

With auto-shut off and a unique nightlight function, our humidifier is a nursery room must have! Ensure your children are receiving quality air throughout the night.

Quiet like breath

Ultra-quiet <30dB operating mode to deliver utterly silent operation.

Fits on cup holder

Designed in a sleek round style which allows it to fit in small spaces such as vehicle cup holders.

Read more

Erie Black
